Greetings,

Intro:
-------
First post and I am new to heritrix but I've rea=
d the doco., searched the mailing list and haven't found a solution so apol=
ogies if I've missed something obvious.

The problem: dynamic content skipp=
ed
------------------------------------
I need to crawl a website -- http:/=
/XYZ.edu.au (placeholder for actual one). Crawling works fine for static co=
ntent, but dynamic content is not crawled.

Configuration:
--------------
 =
Have configured crawler-beans.cxml with . . .

 - prop key seeds.textSource=
.value set to http://XYZ.edu.au
 - writer class set to class=3Dorg.archive.=
modules.writer.MirrorWriterProcessor 
    (so I can check what has been cra=
wled directly)

Everything else left at default values.

Things I've checke=
d/done:
------------------------

I have checked robots.txt to confirm this=
 isn't preventing the crawling. It isn't.

I have crawled successfully usin=
g another program (HTTrack). but I need to generate proper archival content=
 (=3D(W)arc) so heretrix is the right program to use (besides which my prob=
lem _has_ to be a configuration issue, surely.)

I have checked the logs. C=
an't see any errors/warnings about missing dynamically-generated pages.

Ot=
her details:
--------------
The dynamic content is of the form . . . http:/=
/XYZ.edu.au/FMPro?-db=3Dtungwah.fp5&-lay=3DData&-format=3Dformat/tw_results=
.htm&-findall;

and a link off that to another is . . . 

http://XYZ.edu.au=
/FMPro?-db=3Dtungwah.fp5&-format=3Dformat%2ftw_record.htm&-lay=3Ddata&-reci=
d=3D3&-findall=3D

Any pointers to guide me on resolving this would be appr=
eciated.

Thanks and Regards,

--Charlie
